content: this is a summary of a legal case called cassation that took place on january 22nd 2021 the case involves a dispute over the dissolution of matrimonial property in bankruptcy proceedings the court found that the liquidation and division of the property should have occurred before the bankruptcy and the proceeds from the sale of an apartment should have been paid to the liquidator the court set aside the previous judgment and referred the case back to the court of appeal for further consideration the parties involved include the plaintiff defendants and various representatives the plaintiff argues that the appeal courts infringed on the provisions of the law and requests that the judgment of appeal be set aside and the case be referred to another court of appeal
